Parameters.Name: SEARCH-3-1-4 FIND EVENTS – FORWARD AND BACKWARD SEARCH (SEARCH ENDPOINTS INSIDE RECORDING ENDPOINTS)

Test.TestName: FIND EVENTS – FORWARD AND BACKWARD SEARCH (SEARCH ENDPOINTS INSIDE RECORDING ENDPOINTS)
Test.Name: Correct response - no virtual events

Test.TestName: FIND EVENTS – FORWARD AND BACKWARD SEARCH (SEARCH ENDPOINTS INSIDE RECORDING ENDPOINTS)
Test.Name: Correct response - virtual event only

Test.TestName: FIND EVENTS – FORWARD AND BACKWARD SEARCH (SEARCH ENDPOINTS INSIDE RECORDING ENDPOINTS)
Test.Name: Correct response - virtual and not virtual events are present
Test.Description: There is events with StartStateEvent=True, tns1:RecordingHistory/Recording/State. Alternation of IsRecording is from "True" to "True"

Test.TestName: FIND EVENTS – FORWARD AND BACKWARD SEARCH (SEARCH ENDPOINTS INSIDE RECORDING ENDPOINTS)
Test.Name: Correct response - virtual and not virtual events are present
Test.Description: There is events with StartStateEvent=True, tns1:RecordingHistory/Recording/State. Alternation of IsRecording is from "False" to "True"

Test.TestName: FIND EVENTS – FORWARD AND BACKWARD SEARCH (SEARCH ENDPOINTS INSIDE RECORDING ENDPOINTS)
Test.Name: Correct response - there is not alternation
Test.Description: There is events with StartStateEvent=True, tns1:RecordingHistory/Track/State. Alternation of IsDataPresent is from "True" to "True"

Test.TestName: FIND EVENTS – FORWARD AND BACKWARD SEARCH (SEARCH ENDPOINTS INSIDE RECORDING ENDPOINTS)
Test.Name: Correct response - one IsDataPresent and one IsRecording

Test.Name: Correct response - one IsDataPresent and one IsRecording

Test.Name: Correct response - one IsDataPresent and one IsRecording

Test.Name: Correct response - one IsDataPresent and one IsRecording

Test.Name: Correct response - only one IsDataPresent

Test.TestName: FIND EVENTS – FORWARD AND BACKWARD SEARCH (SEARCH ENDPOINTS INSIDE RECORDING ENDPOINTS)

Test.Name: Correct response - events with StartStateEvent=true are different
